bioconda.name: bioconductor-fishalyser
bioconda.summary: FISHalyseR a package for automated FISH quantification

biotools.summary: This software provides functionality to process and analyse digital cell culture images, in particular to quantify FISH probes within nuclei. Furthermore, it extract the spatial location of each nucleus as well as each probe enabling spatial co-localisation analysis.

bioschemas.name: FISHalyseR
bioschemas.summary: This software provides functionality to process and analyse digital cell culture images, in particular to quantify FISH probes within nuclei. Furthermore, it extract the spatial location of each nucleus as well as each probe enabling spatial co-localisation analysis.
